text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem SHINNYQuestionnaires

This case-sensitive code system http://shinny.org/us/ny/hrsn/CodeSystem/SHINNYQuestionnaires defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
assessment-approval-questionnaire Assessment Approval QuestionnairePatient approval to move forward with completing the assessment.
assessment-outreach-questionnaire Assessment Outreach QuestionnaireInformation regarding the patient outreach from the SCN for a patient assessment.
administrative-questionnaire Administrative QuestionnaireAdministrative questions that capture information about the patient's population categorization, specific services needed and/or medical necessities.
service-duplication-questionnaire Service Duplication QuestionnaireIndicator questions recording whether the patient receives assistance from a variety of programs, as well as other social and healthcare needs.
referral-approval-questionnaire Referral Approval QuestionnairePatient approval to move forward with the referral.
hrsn-outreach-questionnaire HRSN Outreach QuestionnaireCaptures the service provider outreach date.
scn-outreach-questionnaire SCN Outreach QuestionnaireCaptures the service provider outreach date.
disability-questionnaire Disability QuestionnaireCaptures responses about a patient's disability mobility.
nys-hrsn-questionnaire NYS HRSN QuestionnaireNYS Accountable Health Communities (AHC) Health-Related Social Needs Screening (HRSN) tool
patient-assessment-approval Patient Assessment ApprovalPatient approval to move forward with completing the assessment.
administrative-questions Administrative QuestionsAdministrative quesitons that verify information about the patient.
hrsn-outreach HRSN OutreachQuestions regarding the HRSN outreach.
assessment-outreach Assessment OutreachQuestions regarding the assessment outreach.
referral-approval Referral ApprovalQuestions regarding the referral approval.
scn-outreach SCN OutreachQuestions regarding the SCN outreach.
service-duplication-questions Service Duplication QuestionsQuestions regarding service duplication.
disability-questions Disability QuestionsCaptures a collection of screening responses about a patient's mobility and self-care.
patient-assessment-approval-indicator Patient Assessment Approval IndicatorIndicator of whether the patient agreed to move forward with completing the assessment.
patient-assessment-outreach-date Patient Assessment Outreach DateDate that a patient first receives outreach from SCN for assessment follow-up.
patient-assessment-outreach-status Patient Assessment Outreach StatusWhat was the final result of the patient assessment outreach? Did the patient get assessed? No response?
outreach-method Outreach MethodDescribes the method of contact used to reach out to the patient.
enhanced-population-check Enhanced Population CheckCheck populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, resulting in SCN request to update covered population categorization with MCO.
service-duplication-check Service Duplication CheckCheck populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives services that would inhibit ability to deliver any or all NYHER services.
clinical-criteria-check Clinical Criteria CheckCheck populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient has the required medical necessity that would satisfy requirement to deliver NYHER service.
housing-program Housing ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives or is on any housing waitlists (e.g., HUD. Section 8, local housing authority, or other voucher programs).
nutritional-education-program Nutritional Education ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives nutritional counseling or education.
nutritional-services-program Nutritional Services ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is actively engaged in a nutrition program.
food-service-program Food Servie ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives any home-delivered meals or food services.
snapp-program SNAPP ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in SNAP.
wic-program WIC ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in WIC.
tanf-program TANF ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in TANF.
transportation-program Transportation ProgramIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in Transportation services.
medication-requiring-refrigeration Medication Requiring RefrigerationIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently prescribed medication, requiring refrigeration for the management of a chronic condition.
breast-milk-requiriing-refrigeration Breast Millk Requiring RefrigerationIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is a pregnant/postpartum persons that require a refrigeration for breast milk.
adls-iadls ADLS-IADLSIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently has Activities of Daily Living (ADLs) & Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADLs) needs.
medical-respite Medical RespiteIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient meets the qualifications for medical respite (see notes).
childcare-assistance Childcare AssisstanceIndicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient needs assistance with childcare.
patient-referral-approval Patient Referral ApprovalPatient approval to move forward with the referral.
hrsn-referral-outreach-date HRSN Referral Outreach DateThe date/time the HRSN Service Provider conducted outreach to patient, based on accepted referral.
scn-referral-outreach-date SCN Referral Outreach DateThe date/time the SCN conducted outreach to the patient, based on referral if outreach is not initiated by HRSN Service Provider/Social Service Provider.
difficulty-walking-climbing-stairs Difficulty Walking Climbing StairsDo you have serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs? (5 years old or older)
difficulty-dressing-bathing Difficulty Dressing BathingDo you have difficulty dressing or bathing? (5 years old or older)
medicaid-high-utilizer Medicaid High Utilizer
nys-health-home Individuals Enrolled in a NYS Health Home
substance-use-disorders Individuals with Substance Use Disorders
pregnant-postpartum Pregnant and Postpartum Persons
children-high-risk High-Risk Children Under 18 Years Old
intellectual-developmental-disabiity Individuals with an Intellectual or Developmental Disability
serious-mental-illness Individuals with Serious Mental Illness
released-chronic-condition Individuals with a Chronic Condition Released from Incarceration in the Past 90 Days
high-risk-under-six-years High-Risk Children Under 6 Years Old
children-alternative-care Juvenile Justice-Involved, Foster Care Youth and Those Under Kinship Care
other-eligible-population Other Eligible Population
supportive-housing Supportive Housing
healthy-homes Healthy Homes
nutritional-counseling Nutritional Counseling
medical-tailored-meals Medically Tailored Meals (MTM) In-lieu of Services (ILOS)
health-home-enrollment Health Home Enrollment (under Enhanced Populations)
opwdd-waiver Office for Persons with Developmental Disabilities (OPWDD) Waiver
tbi-waiver Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) Waiver
nhtd-waiver Nursing Home Transition Diversion (NHTD) Waiver
childrens-waiver Childrens Waiver
medicaid-advantage-program Medicaid Advantage Program (MAP)
mltcp Partial Capitation Managed Long-Term Care (MLTCP)
chronic-condition Chronic Condition
uncontrolled-asthma Uncontrolled Asthma
nutrition-therapy Enteral or Parenteral Nutrition Therapy
current-institutional-setting Currently in an Institutional Setting
heat-related-illness Heat-Related Illness Requiring an ER or UC Visit
cold-related-illness Cold-Related Illness Requiring an ER or UC Visit
thermoregulation-interference Conditions and Medications Interfering with Thermoregulation
none-of-the-above None of the Above
asked-declined Asked But Declined
phone Phone
fax Fax
email Email
pager Pager
url URL
sms SMS
other Other
